RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Epic Arpeggiator
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Create new note sequences with a note matrix GUI and a lot of other very powerful arpeggiator features. Can be found in the 'Tools' menu as 'Epic Arpegiator...'.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Vincent Voois [ http://tinyurl.com/vvrns ]
